title: Bug 10403: Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a new project, the user does not receive a confirmation that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
EB: When creating a new project, the user should receive a confirmation that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR: Update the project creation process to display a confirmation message to the user indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
